rules.description: Gmacs in RDC [lots of command/control replacements]
Gmacs in Outlook [command+shift+a -> command+e (attachments on my mac)]
Mac function key row [right_option+numbers -> brightness, mission control, media]
Pok3r Esc: App window switcher / app switcher backwards [option+escape -> command+backtick]
Firefox Easy Container Shortcuts extension new tab [command+t -> command+option+t]
Gmacs use cmd+opt+f for search for certain apps [command+option+f -> command+f]
Slack switch convos like messages.android.com [control+,. -> opt+up/dn]
Teams switch convos like messages.android.com [control+,. -> cmd+opt+left/right]
